item.title: First Script for FireFox
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

um there a easier wayâ€¦

program Openit;
{.include srl/srl.scar}


Procedure Open;
begin
OpenWebPage('Your Webpage here');     //replace  'Your Webpage here' wwith the web page you want to open
Writeln('now opening The Webpage');

end;

begin
ActivateClient;
ClearDebug;
SetUpSRL;
Open;
end.

item.title: First Script for FireFox
item.dc:creator: @emodude emodude
item.description:
@emodude wrote:

simple script but it works

[scar]
///////////////////////////////////////////
//Dudes Firefox Opener //
// //
//This script works in 32 bit color //
//And screen almost any screen resolution//
///////////////////////////////////////////
{.include Osi.txt}
const
Firefox1=16777215;//A Firefox color on the icon
Firefox2=3515087; //Another Firfox color

procedure ClickFirefox;
begin
if
FindColor(x,y,Firefox1,0,0,330, 929) or
FindColor(x,y,Firefox2,0,0,330, 929) then
movemousesmooth(x, y)
clickmouse(x, y, true)
wait(25)
clickmouse(x, y, true)
end;

begin
ClickFirefox;
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
